name: google-cloud-tts
label: Google Cloud Text-to-Speech

universal.name: universal
universal.label: Make an API Call

expect.help: Enter a path relative to `https://texttospeech.googleapis.com`. For example: `/v1/text:synthesize`
expect.name: url
expect.label: URL

expect.help: You don't have to add authorization headers; we already did that for you.
expect.name: headers
expect.label: Headers

universal.description: Performs an arbitrary authorized API call.

synthesizeSpeech.name: synthesizeSpeech
synthesizeSpeech.label: Synthesize a Speech

expect.help: Text or SSML document to be synthesized. The input will be treated as SSML if it starts with `<speak>` and ends with `</speak>`. For more information, see [SSML](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/ssml).
expect.name: input
expect.label: Text or SSML

nested.help: Leave empty to let the service choose a voice based on the other parameters such as `Language Code` and `SSML Gender`.
nested.name: name
nested.label: Name of Voice

nested.help: Leave empty to let the service choose a voice based on the other parameters such as languageCode and name.
nested.name: ssmlGender
nested.label: SSML Gender

spec.help: 1.0 is the normal native speed supported by the specific voice. 2.0 is twice as fast, and 0.5 is half as fast.
spec.name: speakingRate
spec.label: Speaking Rate

spec.help: 20 means increase 20 semitones from the original pitch. -20 means decrease 20 semitones from the original pitch.
spec.name: pitch
spec.label: Speaking Pitch

spec.help: If unset, or set to a value of 0.0 (dB), will play at normal native signal amplitude. A value of -6.0 (dB) will play at approximately half the amplitude of the normal native signal amplitude. A value of +6.0 (dB) will play at approximately twice the amplitude of the normal native signal amplitude. Strongly recommend not to exceed +10 (dB) as there's usually no effective increase in loudness for any value greater than that.
spec.name: volumeGainDb
spec.label: Volume Gain dB

spec.help: if this is different from the voice's natural sample rate, then the synthesizer will honor this request by converting to the desired sample rate (which might result in worse audio quality).
spec.name: sampleRateHertz
spec.label: Sample Rate Hertz

synthesizeSpeech.description: Synthesizes a speech by text or SSML.

google-cloud-tts.name: google-cloud-tts
google-cloud-tts.label: Google Cloud Text-to-Speech

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-pl: View and manage your data across Google Cloud Platform services.

textOrSSML.name: textOrSSML

description: Convert text into natural-sounding speech using an API powered by Googles AI technologies.
